caption: This video appears to be the beginning of a sci-fi movie. It starts with a disabled man in a wheelchair entering a bar, where he sees a burly man harassing a woman. Wanting to do the right thing, he intervenes, but he's no match for the brute and is thrown out by his hair. Perhaps in response to his brave act, two men dressed in black approach him and recruit him for a secret mission. After much contemplation, he agrees. When he next awakens from a hibernation pod, he finds himself aboard a spaceship, traveling through space. From there, he is sent on a mission to a new planet.
